name: RMD-MP
savepath: This is another smaller update to help celebrate our 3-year anniversary! On Jan. 17th, 2022, the open Alpha was released; and i've been slowly chugging away in my

time since then. I hope you guys can enjoy this small celebration of our continued progress, and I'm sorry I didn't have time for more this time around. Also be sure to check out our Discord to enter the free giveaways currently going on...enjoy and good luck!!

With the release of our TCP-enabled mod and client files; we wanted to start working on bringing things up to the level of our SP brethren. D2RLAN will be solely used for TCP-enabled modding, while D2RLaunch will remain for single-player modding. It will obviously look and function almost identically; albeit with some new or changed options. Please be understanding as kinks are worked out and improvements are made; enjoy!
